better.than: one with three detection feature maps

performs.from sentence: Our model with single detection feature map performs better than the one with three detection feature maps , despite its shallower structure , fewer parameters and anchors .

has.from sentence: HIM can improve the performance on hard subset significantly without involving more complex network architecture nor computation overhead .

DH.from sentence: DH itself can also boost the performance , which shows the effectiveness of designing larger convolution for larger anchors .

Combining HIM and DH together.from sentence: Combining HIM and DH together can improve further towards the state - of - the - art performance .

Both photometric distortion and cropping.from sentence: Both photometric distortion and cropping can contribute to a more robust face detector .

extra small scales.from sentence: Diagnosis of multi-scale testing. , the extra small scales are crucial to detect easy faces .
